summary: A magician/alchemist, seeking to create life, finds that he needs the "blood of a virgin" to continue his experiments. He sends out his dwarf assistant to pick out the right girl.
cast: Alice Terry|Paul Wegener|Firmin Gémier|Iván Petrovich|Gladys Hamer|Henry Wilson|Hubert I. Stowitts|Claude Fielding|Gerald Fielding|Rosita Garcia|John George|Michael Powell
title: The Magician
